2.「この向こう 研究室ある！| 今から 扉 開けるプッケ！: There's a lab over there! I'm opening the|door now, Pukka!

5.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん 見ろプケ！| ここが 花 錬金してた研究室！: <if_woman>Hey, look, Puke! This is the lab where you|smelted the flowers! This is where you|promised you'd bring me!<else>Look, Puke! This is the lab where you smelted|the flowers! This is where you promised you'd|bring me!<endif>

6.<if_woman>「おねーちゃんに あげる花 この奥！| ついてこいプッケ！！: <if_woman>A flower for you... in the back! Follow me,|Pukke!<else>A flower for you... in the back! Follow me,|Pukke!<endif>

7.「こんな所に あったのか……。: I didn't know this was here.

9.「道案内 感謝するぞ……！ お前が| エテーネの錬金術師を 探しているのを知り|: Thank you for leading the way. When I found|out you were looking for the alchemist of|Etaine, I followed you for a long time.

10.「テンスの花を作りだそうとする者の| 存在に気づき…… 追い続けて 数十年。|: When I realized that someone was trying to|create the Tens flower... I followed him... I|finally found his lab!

12.「じゃが ヤツの努力も ここまで！| すべてのテンスの花を この世から消し去るこ: But so much for his efforts! It is the|mission of our demon clan to wipe out all|Tens flowers from the face of the earth!

13.「この地に咲いた テンスの花は| 魔導鬼ベゼブーが 焼き尽くしてくれるわ！: The demon Bezeeboo will burn all the flowers|of Tens that bloom in this land!

15.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん…… お願い……。| だいじな…… 花…… 守: <if_woman>Sweetheart... Please... Big... Flower...|Protect me...<else>Nanny... Please... Big... Flower... Protect|me...<endif>

16.「テンスの花は 誰にも渡さん！| ……ジャマをするなら| お前も 焼き尽くしてく: No one gets the flowers of Tens! ... If you|bother me, I'll burn you to a crisp!

17.「すべてのテンスの花を この世から抹消する！| それが 我ら魔導鬼一族の使命じゃ: I will erase all Tens flowers from this|world! That is the mission of our demon clan!

18.「テンスの花は 誰にも渡さん！| ……ジャマをするなら| お前も 焼き尽くしてく: No one gets the flowers of Tens! ... If you|bother me, I'll burn you to a crisp!

20.「も…申し訳……ございません……| 偉大なる 大魔王……マデサゴーラさまぁ……！: I'm... I'm sorry... I'm sorry... The great|demon king... Madhesagoras...! Oh... Ahh...!

22.<if_woman>「ボク 平気。| 錬金術で すごく丈夫に 作ってもらった！|: <if_woman>I... Alchemy made me so strong! Hey, girl!|Come here, Puke!<else>I... Alchemy made me so strong! Hey! Come|here, Puke!<endif>
